movie_name: วิเคราะห์ภาพยนตร์ The Raid 2 แบบเจาะลึก 13 ตัวละคร โดย นิกม์ แสงศิรินาวิน
text:
วิเคราะห์ภาพยนตร์ The Raid 2 แบบเจาะลึก 13 ตัวละคร โดย นิกม์ แสงศิรินาวิน
Father Brother Cop Criminal
THE RAID 2 Berandal
HAMMER GIRL อาวุธที่เลือกใช้ CLAW HAMMERS
Hammer girl is a ruthless hired assassin
Who’s especially gifted with claw
hammers. Hammer Girl and her brother,
Baseball Bat Man, lest behind a broken
home and abusive father in search
of greener pastures.That search yields
death and destruction for anyone
in their way.

RYUICHI อาวุธที่เลือกใช้ SNUB NOSE .38
Goto’s right hand man translator,and consigliore.
He is the Eka of the goto family and ,like Eka
The only thing that stands between Ryuichi
And the Goto throne is Goto’s son Keichi.

THE ASSANSSIN อาวุธที่เลือกใช้ 2 KARAMBIT KNIVES
Little is know about The Assassin
Other than his choice of weapons
And his loyalty to Bejo.Always armed
With 2 short, curved knives.
The Assassin’s heart is as cold
As the steel of his weapons.

EKA อาวุธที่เลือกใช้ AUTO-GLOCK
As Consigliore to the head of the biggest mafia family in Jakarta
Eka acts as Bangun’s right hand man.
If it weren’t for Bangun’s son, Uco.
Eka would be the next in line to rule
Bangun’s empire.
RAMA อาวุธที่เลือกใช้ FISTS and FEET
Rookie Swat Team member turned undercover cop,
Rama integrates himself as a foot
Soldier in Bangun crime family in order
To uncover corruption in the police force.
The higher Rama ries through Bangun’s
Ranks, the better his chances of identifying
Crooked cops with mob ties. But the higher
He ries. The more he risks his true
Identity being discovered

BUNAWAR อาวุธที่เลือกใช้ RAMA
Chief of Jakarta’s anti-corruption task force,
Bunawar is always one step away from
Identifying and arresting the crooked police
Officers who work hand in hand with Jakarta’s
Mob families. With Rama as his secret weapon.
Bunawar hopes to finally bring the whole
Empire of corruption down to its knees.
